name: CGM48
description: '''CGM48''' (read ''C.G.M. Forty-eight'') is a Thai [[Teen idol|idol]] [[girl group]]. It is the first domestic sister group of the Thai idol group [[BNK48]], and the eighth international [[AKB48 Group|sister group]] of [[AKB48]], after [[Indonesia]]'s [[JKT48]], [[China]]'s [[SNH48]] (former),Â [[Thailand]]'s [[BNK48]], [[Philippines]]'s [[MNL48]], [[China]]'s [[TSH48]],  [[Taiwan]]'s [[TPE48]], and [[Vietnam]]'s [[SGO48]] (''disbanded''). The group is named after [[Chiang Mai]], a city in [[Northern Thailand]], where it will be based.
